section.p: To see the comments on redlined portions, or to change the comments click Redlining Edit Redlining... The Edit Redlining Dialog will appear. You can change the type of redlining, and the comment for the redlining.

If you have many redlinings in your document you may want to navigate on redlining. For this click Redlining Find Previous Redlining... or Redlining Find Next Redlining... Serna will find the redlined portion adjacent to the cursor.
You now can reject redlining, which means that redlining marks will be removed and "inserted" redlining will disappear, and "deleted" redlining will stay.
You can also accept redlining, which means that redlining marks will be removed and "inserted" redlining will stay, and "deleted" redlining will disappear.

note.p: If you need to automatically move to the next redlining after review check Redlining Move After Review.
